body:
Okay! I've been inspired by SnowGolemKirby to do a random question post! Alright here goes:

1. What's the weirdest question you've ever been asked?

2.  If you could do anything and not get in trouble what would you do? 

3. If you could only talk to one person on Avicus for the rest of your Minecraft career who would it be?
body_tagged:

title: Random Questions

2. Rob a bank :o
3. errmmm FrostedCupcakez?
